skills.name: Jab
desc: Attacks With A Series Of Rapid Thrusts
Using A Javelin Or Spear Class Weapon

skills.name: Impale
desc: Increases Attack Damage But Rapidly Degrades The Weapon

skills.name: Fend
desc: Attacks All Adjacent Targets

skills.name: Power Strike
desc: Adds Lightning Damage To Attacks With
Javelin And Spear Class Weapons

skills.name: Charged Strike
desc: Adds Lightning Damage To Javelin And Spear Class Weapons
And Releases Charged Bolts Upon Impact

skills.name: Lightning Strike
desc: Adds Lightning Damage To Javelin And Spear Class Weapons
And Releases Chain Lightning Upon Impact

skills.name: Poison Javelin
desc: Magically Enhances Your Javelin
To Leave A Trail Of Poison Clouds

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
desc: Magically Converts Your Javelin Into A Bolt Of Lightning

add.text: Converts {0}% Physical Damage To Elemental Damage

skills.name: Plague Javelin
desc: Magically Enhances Your Javelin To Release
Expanding Clouds Of Poison Upon Impact

skills.name: Lightning Fury
desc: Changes A Thrown Javelin Into A Powerful
Bolt Of Lightning That Splits On Impact

skills.name: Inner Sight
desc: Illuminates Nearby Enemies
Making Them Easier To Hit
For You And Your Party

skills.name: Slow Missiles
desc: Illuminates Nearby Enemies And Slow Their Ranged Attacks

skills.name: Decoy
desc: Creates A Duplicate Of Yourself
That Draws Fire From Enemies

skills.name: Valkyrie
desc: Summons A Powerful Valkyrie Ally

skills.name: Dodge
desc: Passive - You Have A Chance To Dodge
A Melee attack When Attacking
Or Standing Still

skills.name: Avoid
desc: Passive - You Have A Chance To Dodge Enemy Missiles
When Attacking Or Standing Still

skills.name: Evade
desc: Passive - You Have A Chance To Dodge
A Melee Or Missile Attack
When Walking Or Running

skills.name: Critical Strike
desc: Passive - Your Attacks Have A Chance To Do Double Damage

skills.name: Penetrate
desc: Passive - Increases Your Attack Rating

skills.name: Pierce
desc: Passive - Your Missiles Have A Chance To
Pass Through Enemies That They Hit

skills.name: Cold Arrow
desc: Magically Enhances Your Arrows Or Bolts
By Adding Cold Damage And A Slowing Effect
Cold Arrows Only Do Half Of Their Regular Damage

stat.text: Converts {0}% Physical Damage To Elemental Damage

skills.name: Ice Arrow
desc: Magically Enhances Your Arrow Or Bolt
To Freeze Your Enemies

skills.name: Freezing Arrow
desc: Magically Enhances An Arrow Or Bolt
To Freeze Entire Groups Of Monsters

skills.name: Magic Arrow
desc: Creates A Magical Arrow Or Bolt
That Does Extra Damage

stat.text: Converts {0}% Physical Damage To Magic Damage (*TBD)

skills.name: Multiple Shot
desc: Magically Splits One Arrow
Or Bolt Into Many

skills.name: Guided Arrow
desc: Enhances Your Arrows And Bolts
To Track Your Target
Or Seek One Of Its Own

skills.name: Strafe
desc: Magically Splits One Arrow Into Several
That Target Multiple Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Fire Arrow
desc: Magically Enhances Your Arrows
Or Bolts With Fire

stat.text: Converts {0}% Physical Damage To Elemental Damage

skills.name: Exploding Arrow
desc: Enchants An Arrow Or Bolt That Explodes On
Contact, Damaging All Nearby Enemies

skills.name: Immolation Arrow
desc: Enhances Arrows Or Bolts To
Cause Severe Fire Damage And Creates A Pyre Upon Impact

bonus.text: {n}: +{0}% Average Fire Damage Per Second Per Level
